item.description:
Hi everyone!

I would like to organize a day trip to Tanglewood on Saturday, August 1st to enjoy some classic music of Debussy, Copland, and Mozart in the beautiful summer evening in the Berkshire (Eastern Mass).

For those who have not been to Tanglewood, it's a semi-outdoor music venue with lawn area where you can bring food and drinks and have a picnic before and while you enjoy music.

I want to make this event as a potluck. Please bring some food either homemade (preferred) or bought at store for you and the others to share.




When:
August 1st, I am planning to leave Boston at 4 p.m. and retuning to Boston around mid-night.


Cost:
$30 for a lawn ticket and transportation including gas and toll. This does not include food and drinks.


Transportation:
We will need other drivers to volunteer to help transport members to and from Tanglewood which is about 2 hours from Boston. Drivers will be fully compensated for gas (please keep your receipts). More detailed arrangement will be announced later when I have more information.

Passengers will need to do their best to meet at a location convenient for the driver, and this may require passengers to take public transportation to a destination close to the driver. Passengers should also do their very best to be on time.


Guests:
Because of the limited number of spots available, please e-mail me if you would like to bring a guest. For anyone that wants to bring a guest not affiliated with our group, please remember that you are responsible for your guest's behavior.

What to bring:

Everyone:
- A warm fleece, sweatshirt, or blanket (it can occasionally get cold at night)
- Rain gear (in case of rain)
- Any food or drinks you would like share with the group. (Please see above about "Potluck")
Please leave a note about what you would bring to share- Lawn chair, small table, tarp etc. for our picnic
- Sunblock (optional)
- bug spray (optional)



For now, I am opening up the trip to 12 people, but I will do my best to open it up to more people if there are more interest and additional drivers.
item.name: Music at Tanglewood
